The configuration of all the bright orange 
and yellow bands is exactly the same; it 
is rather obscured in the case of the pre 
ceeding bands by the shadow spreading 
over them, but becomes the same again 
in the bright red ones. Even in the dark 
bands (19-21) traces of the design are to 
be seen. The appearance of the green bands,
though the general character be the same,
slightly differs; the shading in the middle 
part of them being increased, they rather 
seem to be divided into two.
